article.title: GeoEye to Provide Threat Analysis
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: GeoEye Analytics Incorporated, McLean, Virginia, is being awarded a potential $22,178,709 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for geospatial analysis, research, and studies. GeoEye Analytics will be performing threat, counter insurgency, and counter terrorism analysis to support intelligence analysis programs and operational organizations. The Naval Surface Warfare Center, Crane, Indiana, is the contracting activity.
